"Al Quran Al Kareem" 
My latest Windows Store App for windows 8. The First Place Winner for February "Windows 8 Best Apps Contest" .. CodeVNext http://www.codevnext.com/contests/windows-8-best-apps-contest .. 

Install it and enjoy listening to Al Quran Al Kareem with the most popular reciters  :)
http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/en-US/app/al-quran-al-kareem/f45c525a-c3d2-4f55-8f67-09976c210cd4

الحلقة الحادية عشر من راديو اسأل مطور, في هذه الحلقة نكمل حوارنا الشيق عن نظم التخزين الحديثة و نتعمق أكثر في الفروق بين النظم الحديثة و النظم العلائقية الكلاسيكية.
Welcome to the 11th episode of Ask Developer Podcast, in this episode we continue our discussion about NOSQL, and this time we dive deeper into the differences between NOSQL data stores and classical Relational (RDBMS) databases

posts.caption: microjs.com
posts.description: Sure, we all love our favorite monolithic frameworks, and sometimes we even use them fully. But how often do we reach for the ride-on John Deere tractor with air conditioning and six-speaker sound system, when a judiciously applied pocketknife would do the trick better, faster, slicker?

posts.description: In computer security, a billion laughs attack is a type of denial-of-service (DoS) attack which is aimed at parsers of XML documents.[1]

posts.message: My #AngularJS video now has 150 views http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=klQtUXijo4E What would you like my next quick video to be about? Asking for diversity!
posts.description: This video is to test how it's like to upload videos on YouTube. In this video we watch how the template engine provided by Angular.JS can do so much for us....
